msbt.message: Today's the day of the Bug-Off. Soooo, I got up suuuuper early! <10_4 />Actually, I never even went to bed.I'm going to catch a whole bunch and get a cute prize Ahhh! Hurry up and start already!
I've got my lucky net and I'm good to go. Listen. Once this thing starts? Watch out. It's going to getle cray.

I want to catch a butterfly or 12 today, . I'm doing some research for a stage costume.I want to be the prettiest, most magnificent fly the world has ever seen!The ONLY one they've ever seen, probably.
If you want to join the Bug-Off, I think you just have to talk to Flick. He can help you out!
I bet you want to show the whole island your fab bug-net skills, don't you, ?
